Effect.PerformanceRealization: %i% was too intimidated by %r% to sympathize.
%r% thought %ip% kindness was out of nowhere.
%r% recognized the romantic subtext in %ip% sympathy.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Fine, we'll break up and I'll date you.
%greeting% %r%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i%, %greeting%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You seem distracted. Is there something wrong?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No, it'sin your head. I'm fine.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Are you sure? I won't laugh at you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm quite sure.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Whatever it is, just know, I understand the feeling one-hundred percent

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What are you blabbering about?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You don't have to say a thing. Just know that I am here.
%greeting% %r%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: oh, %i%, %greeting%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You seem positively downtrodden. Is there something wrong?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No! Well, a little. Today isn't going at all how I'd planned.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Ah, that would bring me down too. Especially after all the planning.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ...Party planning?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Of course, the party.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yes, well, thank you. I'm already feeling a little better.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Not at all. I'm here whenever you'd like!
%greeting% %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i%,%greeting%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You seem distracted, is there something the matter?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: It's nothing, I don't want to bother you with my problems.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That's silly. Tell me anything that's on your mind.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Actually I'm not feeling so bad anymore.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That's good!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I alwaysfeel better just being around you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That's wonderfu-wait, how do you mean?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Thank you, %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i%,%greeting%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You seem distracted, is there something the matter?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: It's nothing, I don't want to bother you with my problems.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That's silly. Tell me anything that's on your mind.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Actually I'm not feeling so bad anymore.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That's good!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I alwaysfeel better just being around you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That''s... really?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Thank you, %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yes! Any time! Wonderful!
%greeting% %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i%,%greeting%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're upset about something.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Am I that transparant?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I know that face.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Right. I don't want you to worry about it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Are you sure? You can tell me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Does that still need to be said? Don't worry about it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: If you've got it under control, I won't butt in.
%greeting% %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i%,%greeting%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You... erm... you seem...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Seem what?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, you're just by yourself in the corner, I was wondering if you were maybe...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Spit it out!
I'm always upset.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Right! How stupid of me! Nothing out of the ordinary here! I'll let you alone now.
%greeting% %r%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i%, %greeting%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You seem distracted. Is there something wrong?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What? Why do you care about me all of the sudden?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well... you just looked upset...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: How do I look upset? What am I upset about?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I don't know! I'm sorry!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: If I were really upset, you'd know it! This isn't upset!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Alright, you're not upset!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Everything is grand! Forever! Go away!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey there.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Sorry to hear about that thing.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yah. Thanks.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey there.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Sorry to hear about that thing.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Just leave me alone.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Fine, whatever.

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %i% tried to get all nostalgic on %r%
%i% tried to flashback on %r% or something

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, remember back in the day when we used to hang out and stuff?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah... good times, huh?
Hey, we should really hang out more often.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Cool! I'm down. $love$
Hey %r%... we used to have some good times, huh?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh... they were times, all right.
Good times, not so much.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %gender(i,dude,girl)%, what's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I was just thinking about the last time we hung out. Remember that crazy thing with the thing?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: OMG totally. You were so %if(0,decked out)elseif(2,on your game)elseif(3,crazy)else(cool)%. Definitely good times.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %gender(i,dude,girl)%, what's happening?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I was just thinking about that time %toc1%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hellz yeah. That was great.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You know it.
%r%... I know we've had issues, but remember back in like eighth grade? We used to have fun then, right?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %gender(i,Man,Sweetheart)%, in eighth grade I mostly remember you %if(1,flirting with anything that moved)elseif(2,playing with your Space Command action figures)elseif(3,being a total douche)elseif(4,going on about how much better than everyone you were)else(being a loser)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You are a %gender(r,total dick,magnificent bitch)%.
%greeting%... %gender(r,man,hey)%, we used to have some good times, didn't we?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: The only good times I've had with you are the moments you've stopped talking.
Like this one.

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %r% thought %i% was being nice instead of mean
%r% thought %i% was being flirty instead of mean
%i% was too nice to make fun of %r%
%i% and %r% had that awkward public fight

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Why, %r%! I'm surprised to see you here.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh? Why's that?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(I didn't realize the city limits of Loserville reached this far,I thought they took out the trash this morning,I usually smell you coming way before I see you,I thought they took you back to the pound last week,I didn't think Whale World was open on weekdays,I thought you were still under quarantine,I thought the new health care plan got rid of pre-existing conditions)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Go eat rocks,Get lost,Go suck a dodgeball,Why don't you fall down a staircase and die,How about you go into quarantine,Die in a fire)%, %random(loser,idiot,pizza face,crapface,moron,you dumb stupid person,puke for brains)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %r%! Where'd you get those clothes, a thrift store?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I totally did! Wow, it's great to find someone else as fashionable and frugal as me.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah... uh... never mind.
Oh, hello, %r%. You look different. Have you gained weight?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What? No.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Maybe it's just your hair. Did you steal that look from like an '80s music video, or are you just naturally unfashionable?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Get lost, %pejorative%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh look, it's %r%. You still plan on taking your cousin to the dance?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Leave me alone, %pejorative%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That's what SHE said, man.
Well, if it isn't %r%, official school %pejorative%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What the hell? I thought we were friends!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You can think whatever you like.
Oh look, it's %r%. You're looking particularly %gender(r,dweeby,chunky)% today.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i%, you're such a kidder. I am not!
I'd be mad, but you're cool enough to get away with it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: ...uh, whatever, %gender(r,man,babe)%.
Oh look, it's %r%. I didn't know they let the geeks out already.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i%, you're so silly. %gender(r,I've never even SEEN a carnival!,I don't play for the South High Cows.)%
Stay sexy, hot stuff.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: ...uh, whatever, %gender(r,man,babe)%.
Oh... hey... %r%. You... you've got a... uh, I mean, your mom's so fat that, uh...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Are you trying to insult me?
That's sweet of you to try, %i%, but everyone knows you're too much of a nice %gender(i,guy,girl)% to pull it off.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Your MOM's a nice %gender(i,guy,girl)%! I mean... wait...
Well, if it isn't %r%, official school %pejorative%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Get lost, %i%. Did you run out of puppies to kick?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just came by to remind you how stupid your stupid face is.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Real mature. What are you, like, 9?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Perfect 10, %gender(r,buddy,baby)%.
Oh look, here comes the old ball and chain.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Nice to see you too, you %random(magnificant failure of a ,hateful snake of a,pitiful excuse for a)% %gender(i,man,woman)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Funny, that was going to be my line. Except you're not much of a %gender(i,man,woman)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %if(0,Why am I dating such a sexist jerk?)elseif(1,Why am I dating such a sexist jerk?)else(That doesn't even make sense. Why am I dating someone so incoherent?)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh please. As if anyone else would date you. You put up with me out of necessity.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I could put up with your corpse just as easily, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, %r%, seriously? I thought I told you that you look terrible in that outfit.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What are you talking about? I wear this all the time!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yes... yes, I've noticed.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %sweetie%, what's wrong?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Nothing *you'd* understand.
Oh, %r%, seriously? I thought I told you that you look terrible in that outfit.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What are you talking about? I wear this all the time!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yes... yes, I've noticed.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %sweetie%, what's wrong?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Nothing *you'd* understand.
Hey, %pejorative%-%buddy%, what's going on?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Stop calling me that! I told you I hate it when you call me that.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Whatever. You love it.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Go bite %random(a laptop case,a gopher feeder,a lawnmower,an ice crampon)%, %pejorative%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Harsh. We still hanging out later?

Oh, I forgot to tell you earlier... %random(you're also a loser,yearbook voted you most likely to succeed at sucking,about those rabid squirrels in your locker-- that was me,I totally posted those pictures of you looking really fat on your profile page)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What the hell is your deal, %pejorative%? Why don't you pick on someone else for a while?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: The point is you suck.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Die in a fire,Go eat a rake,Get lost,STFU,Go. Away)%.

InfluenceRule.name: Competitive people love to show off
Ripped people love to show off
Arrogant people love to show off
Domineering people like to show off
Confident people like to show off
Attention hogs love to show off
Shy people dislike showing off
Clumsy people dislike showing off
Insecure people dislike showing off
Mopey people dislike showing off
Humble people hate showing off
Pacifists dislike showing off
Cheerful people like showing off
Class clowns like showing off
Shaken people dislike like showing off
Sad people hate showing off
Guilty people dislike showing off
Like showing off to someone you want to pick on
Like showing off to someone you have a crush on
Dislike showing off to someone you're scared of
Like showing off to someone you're interested in
Like showing off to someone you don't think is cool
attention hogs don't like to be showed off to
cold people don't like to be showed off to
kind people respond positively to showing off
sympathetic people respond positively to showing off
mean people don't like to be showed off to
insecure people don't like to be showed off to
oblivious people aren't impressed by show-offs
competitive people aren't impressed by show-offs
people feeling bad aren't impressed by show-offs
people feeling good might be charitable to show-offs
feeling good about a person might make you charitable to show-off
feeling bad about a person might make you less charitable to show-off

ripped people more impressed by direct showing off
dumb people more impressed by direct showing off

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %i% tried to show off %pron(i,his/her) %CKB_((i,has),(r,dislikes),())% thing but %r% wasn't into it
%i% showed off that new cellphone game to %r%
%r% helped %i% get the word out about that underground phenom

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%... %random(check out this sketch I did of Ms. Pagels,.check it out. I drew Guernica on my arm in social studies today,check out this awesome origami three-toed sloth I made,check out this miniature Mona Lisa I drew on my hand. Look, it's like she's winking.,check this out. I carved my number 2 pencil into a shank in math class today,watch this. I can tie my fingers into a square knot)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Hehe,Wow,Cool,Groovy,Rad,No way,Hella cool)%. %random(That's actually pretty sweet,That's crazy sauce,That's not bad actually,That's actually surprisingly good,I'm pretty impressed actually)%. You've got %random(skills,skillz,mad skills,talent)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%... check this out.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I think that was the single lamest thing I've ever seen.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%! %greeting%! I was, uh, just coming back from the gym.
Yeah, just workin those pecs.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh my.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Anyway, catch you later.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I hope so!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%! %greeting%! I was just coming back from, uh, getting my hair done.
Yeah, my stylist always says it's so soft and luxurious.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, cool.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Anyway, gotta run. Laterz!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Her hair is so much cooler than mine.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%... check out these guns.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %gender(r,Nice bro,Not bad)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%... check out this cool henna I had done on my arm this morning.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %gender(r,Whoah! Nice. You've got like good style or whatever,Oh that's super cute! You always find the coolest designs)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, check it out. I got an A minus on my Bio final!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah? Well right now I'm getting a D minus in giving a damn.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're getting an F in Shut the Hell Up.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %gender(i,Jerk,Prima Donna)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, check it out... did you know I was double jointed?
I just push against the elbow and...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What? Gross! I am so not in the mood for that right now.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Geez, what's %pron(r,his/her)% problem?
Hey %r%, check out this vintage %toc1% I scored off Auctionator. Isn't it rad?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh, I guess. I'm not really into %toc1%s.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: WHAT? Are you SERIOUS? How could you not be into this amount of awesome?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Chill out,Get a life,Calm down,Easy on the c00lade,Don't freak out)%, %buddy%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%! Check out this %positiveadj% new game I got on my phone. It's called '%toc1% %random(Destroyer,Attack,Mayhem,Adventure,Quest,Tycoon)%.
It's totally cool %toc1% action and the graphics are %random(sick,totally ill)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Wow,Yeah,Hey)%, that%random('s pretty neat, looks awesome, looks like fun, looks sweet. We should do multiplayer some time)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What's up, %buddy%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Not a whole lot,Just living the dream,Freaking out about finals,Just thinking about the Prom,Just keeping it real)%. You?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm still working on %random(those poems,my tan line,this origami ostrich,that short story about death and stuff,that screenplay about a bunch of kids in high school in the week before the Prom)%.
Wanna see?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey, %buddy%, looking good. It's really coming along.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Nah, it sucks. But thanks for saying that. You're a good friend.
%greeting%, %r%. Uh... I don't know if you're interested, but... I have kind of a large collection of %toc1%s that I thought you might be interested in seeing sometime.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh %i%, that's so sa-- I mean, so special! That's so special that you collect things.
I would love to see your little collection except I... uh... I have class.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Don't patronize me.

Instantiation.name: Popular to Unpopular Show Off Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, hello, %r%. Have you seen %random(how many pledges for votes I've gotten to be Prom Royalty this year?,how many signatures my yearbooks have? I say yearbooks because I've had to expand to several additional volumes to hold all the adoring comments.,my new car? My parents totally got it for me because the one I got for my sixteenth birthday is so old-fashioned now.,that stage crew guy? I need him to approve these additional lights for my coronation speech at the prom and I assumed you know him since you're both so unpopular.)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Enjoy your popularity now, %pejorative%. We'll see who's laughing when I'm a %random(successful small business owner,Fortune 500 executive,world-famous celebrity)% and you're %random(working the graveyard shift at a gas station,an alcoholic greeter at a warehouse store,chain smoking your way through raising half a dozen kids,in jail for tax fraud)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: My, somebody's testy.

Hey %r%, check it out. %random(I found this awesome new indie band,I found this hilarious new blog,There's this totally chill new diner in town I discovered,There's this rad new used clothing store around the corner I found)% and I figured a cool %gender(r,cat,kitten)% like you could get the word around.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You found these guys? Cool, I'll check it out and do some name dropping if they're legit.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Sweet. You're a rockstar.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%. Long day?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Tell me about it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I bet I know what you need...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey! Quit it! Quit it!
You spaz.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %random(fair,my darling,young)% %r%.
%random(Aren't you looking delectable today,My but you're looking ravishing today,What a charming outfit you're wearing,The chill air brings no cold to your radiant face)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: wtf did you just touch my ear?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %buddy%, how's it going? Hey, you look really tense. Who wants a massage?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh, no, that's okay.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No really, I know this great technique, it's from %random(Japan,Thailand,China,North Korea,South Korea,Singapore,Laos,Cambodia)%... it feels like a thousand tiny butterflies landing on your...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I said no, okay! Quit it!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Geez, sorry.
Oh, hey, %r%. You'll never guess what I've got here.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Tell me.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, nothing much. Just a %toc1%. You want?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Me likey-wanty.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well you're going to have to come get it.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, all the way over there?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: All the way over here behind my back. Can you reach that far?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Someday, you're going to be somebody's %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %gender(r,stud muffin,babe)%. Ooh, lookin fine.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Excuse me?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I bet I know what you need...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeaachh! Don't touch me!
Get the freak away.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %sweetie%. %random(You know what would look good on your lips? My lips.,You know what I'm thinking? We haven't kissed since last period.,Can I ask my sweetheart for a kiss?,Give me some sugar baby.)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: My thoughts exactly, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're the best.

Hello, %r%. You know, all I could think about in %random(math class today was integrating U and I.,chemistry today was the strength of our covalent bond.,physics today was the potential energy of our relationship trajectory.,quantum mechanics class today was the set of analytic solutions of Schrdinger's equation that includes the quantum harmonic oscillations in your lips.)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %sweetie%, %if(0,my thoughts precisely)else(I don't know what you're talking about but it turns me on)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You balance my equation, %sweetie%.
Hi, %r%. Look, I... I just wanted to tell you...
I think you're a %gender(r,wonderful guy,beautiful girl)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Whoah, personal space.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: OMG I'm so sorry! I didn't... I thought...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Just don't touch me, all right?

SocialGame.name: I'm just not that into you...

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %i% heard some things about %r% %pron(i,he/she)% didn't like
%i% tried to tell %r% %pron(i,he/sher)% wasn't that into %pron(r,him/her)%
%r% became too desperate to accept what %i% was saying.
%i% made it clear that %pron(i, he/she)% is not that into %r% because they are enemies.
%i% made it clear that %pron(i, he/she)% is not that into %r% because %r% isn't popular.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %r%... we need to talk.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: OK, cutie... let's talk.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: So like, uh, here's the thing. I'm... just not really that into you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I mean oh! Well yeah, no, like, I'm totally not into you either. No way. That'd be weird. We're friends, just... just friends.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %r%... we need to talk.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sure, cutie, let's talk.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: So, wow. Here's the thing. I'm kinda... not really all that into you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What? Don't be stupid. You totally are.
Like I'm going to buy that. WHATEVER!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh... well... I guess %pron(r,he/she)% IS pretty hot.
Hey, %r%... we need to talk.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sure %sweetie%. What's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Look, I saw when %toc1%. That was kind of uncool.
I don't really know if I'm all that into you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well that sucks.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %r%... we need to talk.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sure %sweetie%. What's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Look. You're really into %toc1%s. That's cool and everything, but I'm much more of a %toc2% kind of %gender(i,guy,girl)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh.... that's cool! I can get into %toc2%s too!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That's not the point. The point is... I'm really just not that into you, okay?
Hey, %r%... we need to talk.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sure %sweetie%. What's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Look. I know we're dating and everything. But the thing is, I'm really just not that into you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: So... you're breaking up with me?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Not necessarily.
Look, we can still go out. For now. Just don't touch me any more.
Hey, %r%... we need to talk.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sure %sweetie%. What's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Look. I know we're dating and everything. And it's %positiveadj% to be dating someone as great as you. But the thing is...
I'm just not really that into you.
Don't take this the wrong way! We can still date and everything. I... I just didn't want there to be any false pretenses.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Thanks. Thanks, %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %r%... we need to talk.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sure, significant other o'mine. What's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Look... here's the thing. I... I'm just not that into you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh whatever %i%. You're TOTALLY into me! Why would we be dating if you weren't?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh... I don't think you're...
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Who's my %sweetie%? Huh? Who's my %sweetie%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: ....I guess it's still me.
%greeting% %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %i%, what's going on?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Look, I don't know how to say this-

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh No! random%(That time you wanted to hang out I was suppose to bring the sandwhiches, You really didn't want me to come over and hang out that one time, When you told me your favorite color you actually wanted me to buy you a shirt of that color )%, right?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Actually no, I was going to say I'm not that into you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, well... that's fine... I guess.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What was all that other stuff?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Nothing... nothing at all.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%... we need to talk

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Look, I'm just not that into you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No way, earlier when %toc1%, how can you still not like me?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just don't like you the same way that you like me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: But what about when %toc2%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I was just being nice.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm not giving up. You *will* like me!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What do you want %i%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just came to tell you that I really don't like you. You know, the being enemies and all.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well... we could stop being enemies. Would that make you like me?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Nah, I'm not into you enough for that.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh... Well I didn't want to be with you anyway %pejorative%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %i%, what's going on?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just thought you should know. You aren't popular enough for me, I just can't like you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I could become more popular.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah... Not happening.
See Ya!
Hey %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just thought you should know, I'm not that into you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I don't know what your talking about. I'm popular, there's no way you can't want me.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, you are pretty popular.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Duh. Now stop talking nonsense and just tell me how amazing I am.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're amazing!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: See, that wasn't so hard. Never forget how popular I am.

InfluenceRule.name: People who aren't shy are more direct
honest people more likely to ask out
Proving a point about not being shallow by dating unattractive person
Dating an unattractive person in spite of my friends
History of romance makes more likely to ask out
Recent romance
Nice history from r makes a little more likely to ask out
Past action of taboo makes less likely to ask out
Swingers are apparently into gross people
If you're afraid of commitment you might not ask someone out
A little more likely to date someone who has things you want
More likely to date someone you have a lot in common with
Likely to date someone who has been romantic to you
Unikely to date someone who has been mean to you (unless you like it that way)
Less likely to date taboo people (unless you're oblivious)
If you have a crush, most people likely to respond to sincerity vs crassness
Confused people less likely to accept offer
Popular people less likely to accept blatant public offer from unpopular people
Inarticulate people more likely to appreciate straightforward offer rather than verbal play
People who take things slowly more likely to want a history of romantic behavior
Someone scared of a third party more likely to want a nice realtionship

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah. Like it was yesterday.
